item.title: C++ 面向对象编程
item.description: 最开始的开始 首先创建一个头文件并写一个最简单的 Logger 类： 1// Logger.h 2#pragma once 3 4#include<iostream> 5 6class Logger { 7private: 8 int _log_level = 1; 9 10public: 11 enum levels : int { 12 LOG_LEVEL_INFO = 1, 13 LOG_LEVEL_WARN = 2, 14 LOG_LEVEL_ERROR = 3 15 }; 16 17 void set_level(int level) { 18 _log_level = level; 19 } 20 21 void info(const char* message) { 22 if (_log_level <= LOG_LEVEL_INFO) { 23 std::cout << "\033[32m[INFO]: " << message << "\033[0m" << std::endl; 24 } 25 } 26 27 void warn(const char* message) { 28 if (_log_level <= LOG_LEVEL_WARN) { 29 std::cout << "\033[33m[WARN]: " << message << "\033[0m" << std::endl; 30 } 31 } 32 33 void error(const char* message) { 34 if (_log_level <= LOG_LEVEL_ERROR) { 35 std::cout << "\033[31m[ERROR]: " << message << "\033[0m" << std::endl; 36 } 37 } 38 39 const int get_level() const { 40 return _log_level; 41 } 42 43 const char* get_level_name() const { 44 switch (_log_level) { 45 case LOG_LEVEL_INFO: return "INFO"; 46 case LOG_LEVEL_WARN: return "WARN"; 47 case LOG_LEVEL_ERROR: return "ERROR"; 48 default: return "UNDEFINED"; 49 } 50 } 51 52}; 以及包含主函数的 main.
